newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunisia's Amen Bank raises 1995 profit.
newsitem.headline: Tunisia's Amen Bank raises 1995 profit.

text.p: Tunisia's Amen Bank, the country's only fully privately-owned bank, reported a 7.245 million dinars net profit for 1995, up from 6.625 million dinars in 1994.
It will distribute a dividend of three dinars per share, it said.

Amen Bank, which has a 40 million dinar capital, said in a report received on Tuesday that the size of its balance sheet at the end of 1995 stood at 754.589 million dinars, compared to 665.812 million dinars at end-1994.
The bank is listed at the Tunis Stock exchange. It was last priced at 61 dinars.
